name: Paul Jedd
text: Godfather's makes consistently good pizza, not the best in town, but really good.I like the thin crust and the toppings are always fresh. Very reasonably priced. Their hot wings are really good- don't forget them with your pizza. Always satisfying.

name: Tena Phillips
text: I’ve always had good service and good food!

name: Garner Williams
text: Best pizza in town cooked fresh every time

name: Jammika Puckett
text: Wonderful customer service, great prices, and the food is amazing

name: DDS STUDIO
text: Godfathers beats them all hands down!
